metadata.title: CVE-2024-0450 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was found in the CPython `zipfile` module affecting versions3.12.1, 3.11.7, 3.10.13, 3.9.18, and 3.8.18 and prior. The zipfile moduleis vulnerable to “quoted-overlap” zip-bombs which exploit the zip format tocreate a zip-bomb with a high compression ratio. The fixed versions ofCPython makes the zipfile module reject zip archives which overlap entriesin the archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0450` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

idle-python3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm13
libpython3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm13
libpython3.5-minimal - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm13
libpython3.5-stdlib - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm13
libpython3.5-testsuite - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm13
python3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm13
python3.5-examples - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm13
python3.5-minimal - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm13
python3.5-venv - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm13
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
python3.5 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm13').
